blocks.name: qtopt1
blocks.content: If every equivalence class is closed, then the quotient space is T_1 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm qtopt1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ct1))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ct1))
  -| wi(w0, wfo(c1, c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cfv(ccld, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ct1), wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ctop), wral(s0, cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)), wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, co(c0, cqtop, c1)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cqtop, c1), ctop), wcel(c0, ctop), wfn(c1, c2))
  syl(w0, wfn(c1, c2), wfo(c1, c2, c3))
  fofn(c1, c2, c3)
  qtoptop(c0, c1, c2)
  ralrimiva(s0, cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)), w0, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, co(c0, cqtop, c1))))
  mpbir2and(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)))), wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wss(csn(cv(s0)), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cfv(ccld, c0)))
  snssd(cv(s0), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)))))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wcel(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cfv(ccld, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  eleqtrrd(cv(s0), c3, cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wceq(c3, cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1))))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(c3, cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wcel(c0, ctop), wfo(c1, c2, c3))
  qtopuni(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wb(wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wa(wss(csn(cv(s0)), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cfv(ccld, c0)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wa(wss(csn(cv(s0)), c3), wcel(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cfv(ccld, c0)))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wfo(c1, c2, c3))
  sylibr(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(c2, cuni(c0))))
  jctir(w0, wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(c2, cuni(c0)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c0, ct1))
  t1top(c0)
  istopon(c0, c2)
  qtopcld(c0, c2, c1, c3, csn(cv(s0)))
  ist1(s0, co(c0, cqtop, c1), cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)))
  eqid(cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cqtop, c1)
  diff.cqtop.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm qtopt1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[qTop]c1)∈ Fre)
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fre)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c2 ↠ c3))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→(`' c1 " { s0 })∈(Clsd ` c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, (c0[qTop]c1)∈ Fre, (c0[qTop]c1)∈ Top, ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃(c0[qTop]c1), { s0 } ∈(Clsd `(c0[qTop]c1))))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[qTop]c1)∈ Top, c0 ∈ Top, c1[Fn]c2)
  syl(w0, c1[Fn]c2, (c1 : c2 ↠ c3))
  fofn(c1, c2, c3)
  qtoptop(c0, c1, c2)
  ralrimiva(s0, ⋃(c0[qTop]c1), w0, { s0 } ∈(Clsd `(c0[qTop]c1)))
  mpbir2and((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ⋃(c0[qTop]c1)), { s0 } ∈(Clsd `(c0[qTop]c1)), { s0 } ⊆ c3, (`' c1 " { s0 })∈(Clsd ` c0))
  snssd(s0, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ⋃(c0[qTop]c1)))
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈ ⋃(c0[qTop]c1), (`' c1 " { s0 })∈(Clsd ` c0), s0 ∈ c3)
  eleqtrrd(s0, c3, ⋃(c0[qTop]c1), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ⋃(c0[qTop]c1)))
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ ⋃(c0[qTop]c1))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ ⋃(c0[qTop]c1), c3 = ⋃(c0[qTop]c1))
  syl2anc(w0, c3 = ⋃(c0[qTop]c1), c0 ∈ Top, (c1 : c2 ↠ c3))
  qtopuni(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ ⋃(c0[qTop]c1), ({ s0 } ∈(Clsd `(c0[qTop]c1))↔({ s0 } ⊆ c3 ∧(`' c1 " { s0 })∈(Clsd ` c0))))
  syl2anc(w0, ({ s0 } ∈(Clsd `(c0[qTop]c1))↔({ s0 } ⊆ c3 ∧(`' c1 " { s0 })∈(Clsd ` c0))), c0 ∈(TopOn ` c2), (c1 : c2 ↠ c3))
  sylibr(w0, c0 ∈(TopOn ` c2), (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c2 = ⋃ c0))
  jctir(w0, c0 ∈ Top, c2 = ⋃ c0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ Top, c0 ∈ Fre)
  t1top(c0)
  istopon(c0, c2)
  qtopcld(c0, c2, c1, c3, { s0 })
  ist1(s0, (c0[qTop]c1), ⋃(c0[qTop]c1))
  eqid(⋃(c0[qTop]c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cqtop, c1)
  diff.cqtop.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: qtophaus

blocks.name: circtopn
blocks.content: The topology of the unit circle is generated by open intervals of the polar coordinate. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm circtopn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, cqtop, c1), cfv(ctopn, co(c1, cimas, crefld)))
  -| wceq(c2, co(nat0, cicc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cima(ccnv(cabs), csn(nat1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(co(c0, cqtop, c1), cfv(ctopn, co(c1, cimas, crefld))), wceq(c2, co(nat0, cicc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))))
  ax-mp(wceq(co(c0, cqtop, c1), cfv(ctopn, co(c1, cimas, crefld))), wss(co(c0, cqtop, c1), cpw(c3)))
  sseqtr4i(co(c0, cqtop, c1), cpw(c3), cpw(cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1))))
  pwuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1))
  pweqi(c3, cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1)))
  mp2an(wceq(c3, cuni(co(c0, cqtop, c1))), wcel(c0, ctop), wfo(c1, cr, c3))
  eqeltri(c0, ctop, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  retop()
  qtopuni(c0, c1, cr, c3)
  eqtr4i(cr, cuni(c0), cuni(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
  uniretop()
  unieqi(c0, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  topnid(co(c0, cqtop, c1), c3, co(c1, cimas, crefld))
  mptru(wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, co(c1, cimas, crefld))))
  imasbas(c3, co(c1, cimas, crefld), c1, crefld, cr, ccms, wtru)
  eqcomi(co(c0, cqtop, c1), cfv(cts, co(c1, cimas, crefld)))
  mptru(wceq(cfv(cts, co(c1, cimas, crefld)), co(c0, cqtop, c1)))
  imastset(cfv(cts, co(c1, cimas, crefld)), c0, c1, co(c1, cimas, crefld), crefld, cr, c3, ccms, wtru)
  eqidd(co(c1, cimas, crefld), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cr, cfv(cbs, crefld)))
  rebase()
  a1i(wtru, wfo(c1, cr, c3))
  efifo(s0, c1, c3)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(crefld, ccms))
  recms()
  eqtri(c0, cfv(ctopn, crefld), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  retopn()
  eqid(cfv(cts, co(c1, cimas, crefld)))
}

blocks.name: circcn
blocks.content: The function gluing the real line into the unit circle is continuous. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm circcn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, co(c1, cqtop, c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, co(nat0, cicc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cima(ccnv(cabs), csn(nat1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, co(c1, cqtop, c0))), wceq(c2, co(nat0, cicc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))))
  mp2an(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, co(c1, cqtop, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cr)), wfn(c0, cr))
  eqeltri(c1, cfv(ctopon, cr), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  retopon()
  ax-mp(wfn(c0, cr), wfo(c0, cr, c3))
  efifo(s0, c0, c3)
  fofn(c0, cr, c3)
  qtopid(c1, cr, c0)
}

  eqeltri(c1, (TopOn ` ℝ), (topGen ` ran((,))))
